Description:
Detects the dump of highly sensitive files such as "NTDS.DIT" and "SECURITY" hive.
Attackers can leverage the "wbadmin" utility in order to dump sensitive files that might contain credential or sensitive information.


Author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems), frack113
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Sensitive File Recovery From Backup Via Wbadmin.EXE
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where (((command like '% recovery%' and command like '%recoverytarget%' and command like '%itemtype:file%') and (command like '%\config\sam%' or command like '%\config\security%' or command like '%\config\system%' or command like '%\windows\ntds\ntds.dit%')) and (process_path like '%\wbadmin.exe' and original_file_name = 'wbadmin.exe'))
